descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Principles underlying the dynamical development of microstructure. Point defects, dislocations, internal interfaces and microstructure, lectures, and laboratory.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: There will be lectures and homework assignments. Laboratory exercises will be performed in smaller groups.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: There will be two to three mid-term exams counting toward the final grade, plus homework and lab reports. Active participation in discussion during class hours is strongly encouraged.
